title: Article 110: Amendment to Directive (EU) 2020/1828 | AI Act Service Desk
text:

```markdown
# Article 110: Amendment to Directive (EU) 2020/1828

In [Annex I](https://ai-act-service-desk.ec.europa.eu/en/ai-act/annex-1) to Directive (EU) 2020/1828 of the European Parliament and of the Council [(58)](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli/dir/2020/1828/oj/eng), the following point is added:

'`(68)` Regulation (EU) 2024/1689 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 13 June 2024 laying down harmonised rules on artificial intelligence and amending Regulations (EC) No 300/2008, (EU) No 167/2013, (EU) No 168/2013, (EU) 2018/858, (EU) 2018/1139 and (EU) 2019/2144 and Directives 2014/90/EU, (EU) 2016/797 and (EU) 2020/1828 (Artificial Intelligence Act) ([OJ L, 2024/1689, 12.7.2024, ELI: http://data.europa.eu/eli/reg/2024/1689/oj](https://data.europa.eu/eli/reg/2024/1689/oj)).'.
```
